content.p: Discover the stories of our engineering graduates Meet our awesome engineering and architecture alumni. Find out about their careers and what they valued most about their Nottingham experience. Aerospace Engineering MEng Mechanical Engineering MEng Chemical with Environmental Engineering MEng Electrical and Electronic Engineering MSc Architecture and Environmental Design MArch Civil Engineering BEng Going to a well renowned university gave me an advantage when applying to companies. The course and tutors at Nottingham were very high quality and known by local employers to be good. I continued my studies at Nottingham with a Masters and Diploma. Don't be afraid of being a bit different, but always listen, look and read as much as you can, you will never stop learning! Kieren Majhail - Architecture MArch ARB/RIBA Part 2 (Associate, Karakusevic Carson Architects) Find engineering or architecture courses Access support and help future graduates We open doors to a successful career
